entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 21 April 2023
